oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldier certificate of James L. Parham, Co. A, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Soldiers certificate of Pvt. James L. Parham, Co. A, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA. This certificate documents that Parham served in the Union army and thus proves that he is eligible to vote. In the immediate aftermath of the war, former Confederates were denied the vote. Parham, as a former Union soldier from Tennessee, retained his voting rights.
